What happens after signup

Day 0: Intake Share your goals, vibe, and references in the Get Started flow.
Day 2: First draft We deliver a working site draft + initial automation map.
Day 5: Launch + support We polish, connect your domain, and set up ongoing support.
Ongoing: Iterate Weekly consults, updates, and community support.
